data.title: API
data.description: An API playground using the PokeAPI. It allows you to search for Pokemon, moves, and more.

data.title: DataBase
data.description: A DB playground where you can simulate queries to SQL and NoSQL databases.

data.title: Auth
data.description: A playground for authentication and authorization.

data.title: Utils
data.description: A playground for utility functions such as tests, and more.
